title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. A - Motorboats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. A - Motorboats

State Regulations

Part 444 - Registration of Vessels and Reports of Accidents (§ 444.1 to 444.18)

Part 445 - Navigation of Vessels on the Navigable Waters of New York State and on the Tidewaters Bordering on or Lying Within the Boundaries of Nassau and Suffolk Counties (§ 445.1 to 445.2)

Part 446 - Appearance Ticket And Simplified Information (§ 446.0 to 446.1 to 446.14 to 446.17)

Part 447 - Conduct Of Regattas (§ 447.1 to 447.4)

Part 448 - Placing Of Navigation Aids And Floating Objects In Navigable Waters Of New York State-diver Regulations And Use Of Diver Flags (§ 448.1 to 448.9)

Part 449 - Equipment To Be Carried On Public Vessels (§ 449.1 to 449.8)

Part 450 - Inspection Of Reports And Records (§ 450.1 to 450.20 to 450.24)

Part 451 - Safe Boating (§ 451.0 to 451.15)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. A
[FN*] Designated agents for enforcement of the Navigation

Law and regulations promulgated thereunder are set forth in Appendix I-1, infra. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
